name: bdev-al-xml-doc
description: Generate AL XML documentation comments and create Markdown documentation from your source code.

commands.title: AL DOC: Generate markdown documentation for directory

bdev-al-xml-doc.markdown_path.description: Specifies the path where the markdown files should be created.

bdev-al-xml-doc.verbose.description: Specifies whether detailed information should be output during execution.

enumDescriptions: Only global procedures are recognized in markdown export.
All procedures are recognized in markdown export.
bdev-al-xml-doc.exportScope.description: Specifies the accessibility level (scope) of the procedures to be exported as markdown.

enumDescriptions: Procedures in Test codeunits with [Test] declaration.

bdev-al-xml-doc.procedureTypes.description: Sets the list of procedure types (e.g. event publisher, tests) checked.

bdev-al-xml-doc.enableDocComments.description: Specifies whether typing '///' will insert the xml documentation structure.

bdev-al-xml-doc.enableSummaryHover.description: Specifies whether <summary> description should be shown on procedures as tooltip.

bdev-al-xml-doc.enableSignatureHover.description: Specifies whether <param> description should be shown on procedure signatures.

bdev-al-xml-doc.askEnableCheckProcedureD.description: Specifies whether a confirmation will appear to enable procedure documentation for each workspace.

bdev-al-xml-doc.checkProcedureDocumentat.description: Specifies whether procedure documentations should be checked and undocumented procedures reported.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
